faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We answer the most common questions about our platform

items.question: How difficult is it to implement AI in my company?
items.answer: Very easy. Our team takes care of everything. You just need a 30-minute initial meeting and in 24 hours you'll be using the platform.

items.question: Do I need technical knowledge to use UpNova?
items.answer: You don't need to be technical. We designed our interface so anyone can use it. Plus, we include personalized training.

items.question: How do you guarantee the ROI you promise?
items.answer: We have clear productivity and automation metrics. If you don't see measurable improvements in the first month, we'll refund 100% of your investment.

items.question: What about my data? Is it secure?
items.answer: Absolute security. We use military-grade encryption, comply with GDPR and never share your information with third parties.

items.question: Can I cancel whenever I want?
items.answer: Yes, without penalties. We believe in earning your trust every day, not in contracts that tie you down.
